file.header: These variables CANNOT BE CHANGED once a case has been created. Invoke create_newcase again if a different grid or component combination is required.

entry.desc: model system name
contains both header and group information for all the case env_*.xml files
Case Tools directory location (derived variable, not in namelists
Buildconf directory location (derived variable not in namelist)
Scripts root directory location (setup automatically to $CIMEROOT/scripts- DO NOT EDIT)
Scripts root utils directory location (setup automatically to $CIMEROOT/scripts/Tools - DO NOT EDIT)
Apparent version of the model used for this case
file containing specification of all supported model grids, domains and mapping files (for documentation only - DO NOT EDIT)
file containing machine specifications for target model primary component (for documentation only - DO NOT EDIT)
file containing batch system details for target system (for documentation only - DO NOT EDIT)
file containing compiler specifications for target model primary component (for documentation only - DO NOT EDIT)
file containing specification of pio settings for target model possible machine, compiler, mpilib, compset and/or grid attributes (for documentation only - DO NOT EDIT)
file containing specification of all compsets for primary component (for documentation only - DO NOT EDIT)
file containing specification of all pe-layouts for primary component (for documentation only - DO NOT EDIT)
file containing specification of archive files for each component (for documentation only - DO NOT EDIT)
file containing specification of all system tests for primary component (for documentation only - DO NOT EDIT)
directory containing test modifications for primary component tests (for documentation only - DO NOT EDIT)
directory containing user modifications for primary components (for documentation only - DO NOT EDIT)

This component requires a clean build if the pelayout changes, if this variable is not defined for a component it is assumed false

This component requires a clean build if the pelayout changes, if this variable is not defined for a component it is assumed FALSE

path to user mods under TESTS_MODS_DIR or USER_MODS_DIR
User mods to apply to specific compset matches. These usermods will be used only if cam is the principle component in the compset (F or Q compsets)
